description: Portstewart face a north-west derby against Limavady United in the first round of the Northern Ireland League Cup.
title: NI League Cup: Portstewart host Limavady in north-west derby
title_page: NI League Cup: Portstewart host Limavady in north-west derby - BBC Sport
maintext:
Portstewart face a north-west derby against Limavady United in the Northern Ireland League Cup first round.
The Northern Ireland Intermediate League champions, who won three trophies last season, will be at home against Championship side Limavady.
Dergview, Harland & Wolff and Sport & Leisure were also drawn at home in the opening round of the League Cup won by Ballymena United last season.
All ties will be played on Saturday 5 August.
BetMcLean.com League Cup first round draw:
Harland & Wolff Welders v Armagh City
Sport & Leisure v Lurgan City
Dergview v Annagh United
Portstewart v Limavady United
